skills.name: Help Me, Teddy
skills.description: Summons a teddy bear to attack the enemy. This attack has a 25% chance to forcibly put the enemy to sleep for 1 turn. Acquires another turn if the enemy falls asleep.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +10%
Damage +10%

skill_effect.name: Sleep
skill_effect.description: The monster is put to sleep and cannot attack unless awakened, either after a fixed amount of turns or after taking damage

skills.name: Toy Knight
skills.description: Summons a doll knight and attacks all enemies. Stuns them for 1 turn and decreases their Attack Speed for 2 turns with a 50% chance each.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.name: Light Guardian Angel
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 3 times to inflict damage that increases accordingly to your MAX HP and decreases the Attack Power for 3 turns with a 40% chance each. Afterwards, increases the Defense of all allies for 3 turns additionally.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.multiplier_formula: 0.75*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.05*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>
